verses.name: Ezekiel 23:38
verses.text: Moreover this they have done unto me: they have defiled my sanctuary in the same day, and have profaned my sabbaths.

verses.name: Ezekiel 23:39
verses.text: For when they had slain their children to their idols, then they came the same day into my sanctuary to profane it; and, lo, thus have they done in the midst of mine house.

verses.name: Ezekiel 23:40
verses.text: And furthermore, that ye have sent for men to come from far, unto whom a messenger was sent; and, lo, they came: for whom thou didst wash thyself, paintedst thy eyes, and deckedst thyself with ornaments,
